text: On 4 and 5 June 2021, a massacres happened in the Solhan and Tadaryat villages in Yagha Province of Burkina Faso. The attacks left at least 160 people dead. In the evening of 4 June 2021, 13 civilians and a soldier were killed in an attack in the village of Tadaryat. The attackers also raided the community's motorbikes and cattle. Hours later in the early morning of 5 June 2021, insurgents attacked Solhan village in Yagha, killing at least 138 civilians, including seven children, and wounding 40 others. ==References== Category:2021 crimes in Africa Category:2021 mass shootings Category:2020s mass shootings in Africa Category:2020s murders in Africa Category:2020s in Burkina Faso Category:June 2021 events Category:Mass murder in 2021 Category:Massacres in Africa Category:Terrorist incidents in 2021 Category:Terrorist incidents in Africa in the 2020s
title: Solhan and Tadaryat massacres
